Document.name: Best Practices and Implementation Idioms (Spanish Translation)
Document.author: Cliff Hall (Translated by Daniel Garay)

NodeMap.Document:
Today, I'm pleased to announce the availability of the Spanish translation of the PureMVC Implementation Idioms and Best Practices document ( Estilo de Aplicacion y Mejores PrÃ¡cticas ) thanks to the efforts of Cristian Daniel Garay Sosa of Paraquay.

This brings PureMVC Best Practices to over 20 Spanish-speaking countries.

Muchas gracias, Daniel for all your hard work and revisions. Your efforts are much appreciated!
-=Cliff>
